About Us

Home -About Us

Overview Introduction

XINH.com is the website of XINH IMPORT-EXPORT CO., LTD providing a variety of furniture products for Living Room, Bedroom, Kitchen, Office, Household.
With more than 20 years of experience and the mission of "BRINGING COMFORTABLE LIFE", we always try our best to improve products, enhance customer experience with high quality product lines at reasonable prices.

Our Products are manufactured by advanced production lines of export quality with existing domestic raw materials and are imported from long-standing and reputable partners who are thoroughly tested to create the best quality products. high quality product line to meet all the strict requirements of customers. Our main product lines are cheap bunk beds and cheap dining tables.



Meaning of XINH

The word "beautiful" is a Vietnamese word, and it has many different meanings depending on the context of use. Here are some common meanings of the word "pretty":

  Beautiful: "Beautiful" is often used to describe the beauty of a person, object or landscape.

  Cute: "Pretty" can also mean cute and adorable.

  Elegant, elegant: "Pretty" can also describe a person's elegance and sophistication.

  In addition, in some contexts, "pretty" can also be used to describe pleasantness and comfort.

What about at XINH furniture: This is the name that the entire leadership team and staff have chosen among countless other good names. With the motto "Serving to lead", XINH wishes to bring the most meaningful experiences to customers like the name XINH itself, a name with a lot of meaning. XINH is the origin of world-class interior works.



Vision

XINH Furniture has always been a pioneer in creating high-value interior products that enhance comfort & quality of life for many people.

Core values

 Pioneering & Innovative

 Quality & Reputation

 Always Honest and Consistency in all activities

 Build a sense of responsibility

 Build loyalty

 Building a good business culture: "Prestige - Sincerity & Kindness".



Business philosophy of XINH furniture

With the philosophy of "Serving To Lead", we are constantly creating, learning and innovating, combined with modern equipment, professional production management process and long-time skilled technical team. to produce products to suit all customer needs.


The trust and companionship of our customers during the past time has created a great motivation for us to develop. In return for that trust, we are committed to constantly improving to bring the best quality products and best service to our customers.
